author: Kynix @KynixXBT
text: $ASTER did a 2x since this post advising caution. When CZ posted it at 0.17 it was an easy bet on crime, the question was if you saw it then. I saw it above 0.5 for the first time when all of CT was up millions already. Easy fade. Ridiculously overvalued by now. Don't roundtrip!
